text: When I notice sales opportunities, I recognize them and choose to approach with confidence and clarity instead.
During moments when selling feels challenging, I notice it and choose to stay calm and guide with confidence instead.
When I feel the pull to let fear control selling, I notice it and choose to stay confident and guide instead.
I let not being able to approach sales prevent me from selling with confidence and clarity effectively.
When I notice myself selling confidently, I recognize it and choose to maintain those clear patterns.
I see when sales situations need confidence, and I choose to approach with clarity and guide instead.
When I feel the urge to let uncertainty control selling, I notice it and choose to stay confident and clear instead.
I let not identifying sales opportunities prevent me from approaching with confidence and selling effectively.
When I notice sales confidence working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those clear patterns.
I recognize when selling feels challenging, and I choose to stay calm and guide with confidence instead.
When I feel the pull to avoid sales situations, I notice it and choose to approach with confidence instead.
I let problems from not approaching sales prevent me from selling with confidence and clarity.
When I notice confident selling working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those patterns.
I see when sales need confidence, and I choose to approach with clarity and guide effectively instead.
When I feel the urge to let fear control selling, I notice it and choose to stay confident and clear instead.
I let not being able to stay confident prevent me from approaching sales and selling effectively.
When I notice myself maintaining sales confidence, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those patterns.
I recognize when sales situations need confidence, and I choose to approach with clarity and guide instead.
When I feel the pull to let uncertainty control selling, I notice it and choose to stay confident and guide instead.
I let not identifying sales confidence abilities prevent me from approaching and selling with clarity effectively.
